Ben Gordon back with UConn men's basketball 'family' as 2004 title team honored: 'In a good place'

Gordon helped UConn to the 2004 national championship and had an 11-year NBA career. Struggles with mental health have disrupted his personal life.

Best of luck to him.

Glad he is doing well and hope he realizes it's a life-long process for him.

Try telling thst to most Boneyarders who think he's evil on his own cognition. I recall watching Ben on a Vice episode almost a decade ago which followed him around and documented his vegan lifestyle as an athlete. You could tell then that his psychosis was breaking through.

Glad he has this support group.

Hard times are hard. It must be harder when your worst days and biggest mistakes are played out in the publics eyes.

Best of luck to him.

I love Ben and empathize with him given his struggles, but at least one of the things he was charged with was quite unsettling. I truly hope he's on the road to repairing any relationships he's damaged.
